title: A bill to prohibit Federal funding of Planned Parenthood Federation of America.
short_title: A bill to prohibit Federal funding of Planned Parenthood Federation of America.
latest_major_action: Motion by Senator McConnell to reconsider the vote by which cloture on the motion to proceed to the measure was not invoked (Record Vote No. 262) entered in Senate.
summary: This bill prohibits federal funding of Planned Parenthood Federation of America or its affiliates, subsidiaries, successors, or clinics.
summary_short: This bill prohibits federal funding of Planned Parenthood Federation of America or its affiliates, subsidiaries, successors, or clinics.

actions.description: Motion by Senator McConnell to reconsider the vote by which cloture on the motion to proceed to the measure was not invoked (Record Vote No. 262) entered in Senate.
Cloture on the motion to proceed to the measure not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 46. Record Vote Number: 262. (consideration: CR S6227-6228; text: CR S6227)
Motion to proceed to measure considered in Senate. (consideration: CR S6215-6228)
Cloture motion on the motion to proceed to the measure presented in Senate. (consideration CR S6161; text: CR S6161)
Motion to proceed to consideration of measure made in Senate. (consideration CR S6161-6164, S6166-6180)
Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 169.
Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

votes.question: On Cloture on the Motion to Proceed
votes.result: Cloture on the Motion to Proceed Rejected
